page.title: 01AROUND TILSTONE FEARNALL
page.content: { Tilstone Fearnall}is a small rural village of just under 700 acres which lies about one mile south-east of {Tarporley}on either side of the{A51 Chester - Newcastle road.The{School and the{Church}lie on the south side of the road, while{Tilstone Lodge}lies to the north. It lies in the{Cheshire Plain,}which consists of rich grassland, ideal for {dairy farming.} Most of the land in this area is used in this way,the predominant herds of cattle being{Friesians,}although some farms do have other breeds as well. There are very few houses,no shops or public houses in this area.
